title: Refeitorio Organico
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Brazilian, Latin American
description: Buffet style with many choices including sushi, miso, salad bar, soya meats, and lots of vegan takes on local specialties. The only non-vegan item is honey (Apr 2016). Location is tucked away down a passageway and up some stairs in Rua Dezzanove de Fevereiro, look for the sign.
streetAddress: Rua Dezenove de Fevereiro, 120,  Botafogo, Zona Sul
